```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```


```{r}
df <- tibble(
  x = sample(letters, 10, T),
  y = round(rnorm(10, 10, 3), 0)
)

df <- df %>%
  arrange(x) %>% 
  mutate(
    rank = rank(x, ties.method = "min"),
    uniq = duplicated(x),
    logical = as.numeric(uniq),
    log_cum = cumsum(logical),
    rank_l = rank - log_cum
  )

df
```
